title: (x) Serif font with peculiar "g" - Baker Signet {Nick Cooke}
content:
I'm asking what font is the attached sample.  
It has a strange "g", maybe the solution is there.

thank you for the help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |

author: arzach

comments.content: Baker Signet by Arthur Baker from 1965 [Baker Signet](http://web.archive.org/web/20100304071745/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/baker+signet/fonts/)

Thank you guys.  
You are amazing and I was sure to find an answer here.

Thank you again!
